title: New: Dirty Projectors – Dance For You
content:
Yet another indie band to receive the Twitter trend stamp of approval, Dirty Projectors new track Dance For You deserves all the plaudits that come it’s way.

Blending one part Animal Collective with bluegrass folk inspirations, Dance For You is the sound of the summer yet to arrive, the hope that maybe, just maybe, this year the sun will come out. Hell, even if it doesn’t, at least we’ve got Dirty Projectors.

Dance For You is taken from Dirty Projectors upcoming LP Swing Lo Magellan – 9 July 2012 on Domino Records.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
